sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘四十四，小餘一百七十五；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder forty four, small remainder one hundred seventy five;
Large remainder seven, small remainder sixteen;

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘八，小餘八十二；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder eight, small remainder eighty two;
Large remainder twelve, small remainder twenty four;
Duameng Chi Fen Ruo Jing Ning first year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘二，小餘四百三十；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder two, small remainder four hundred thirty;
Large remainder eighteen, no small remainder;
You Zhao Shetige Jian Shi first year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘五十六，小餘七百七十八；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder fifty six, small remainder seven hundred seventy eight;
Large remainder twenty three, small remainder eight;
Qiang Wu Shan E second year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘二十，小餘六百八十五；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder twenty, small remainder six hundred eighty five;
Large remainder twenty eight, small remainder sixteen;
Tu Wei Zhi Xu third year.
